techmeme.title: Sources: Apple is planning a new AirPods feature as part of iOS 19 that will enable live-translation of in-person conversations (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Google releases its proposals for White House's AI Action Plan, arguing that "fair use and text-and-data mining exceptions" are "critical" to AI development (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Crypto payments company MoonPay acquires Iron, an API-focused stablecoin infrastructure company, a source says in a "nine-figure" deal (The Block)
Nvidia is expected to announce new GPUs, named after Vera Rubin, the female scientist who discovered dark matter, on March 18 at its annual GTC conference (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
Sources: Elon Musk visited the NSA and discussed staff reductions and operations with its leadership, a week after saying the agency needs an overhaul (Wall Street Journal)
